GapFillDragDrop.Title: Review of Wh- questions
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a word/phrase and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1. Wheredid you meet your husband? Was it at work?
2. How manyyears of military service do you have to do?
3. Whosebag is this? Is it yours?
4. Whichdo you prefer? Wine or beer?
5. How muchdid you pay for your studies?
6. Whydid you leave home at 16? Were you unhappy?
7. Whendid you start at secondary school?
8. Whatis the height of Mount Everest?
9. Whodid you sit next to at primary school?
10. What timeis the concert starting this evening?
